mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(prdNum, prdName, prdIntro, prdContent, prdPrice, prdDisCount, prdShip, prdPoint, prdPet, prdState, prdHitCount, prdCreated, prdCategoryNum, userId) VALUES (#{prdNum}, #{prdName}, #{prdIntro}, #{prdContent}, #{prdPrice}, #{prdDisCount}, #{prdShip}, #{prdPoint}, #{prdPet}, #{prdState}, #{prdHitCount}, SYSDATE, #{prdCategoryNum}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO prdImage(imgNum, imgFilename, prdNum) VALUES (prdImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{imgFilename}, #{prdNum})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM product p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId=m.userId
SELECT p.prdNum, prdName, prdIntro, prdPrice, prdDisCount, prdPoint, prdState, prdHitCount, imgFilename FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN prdImage i ON p.prdNum = i.prdNum
mapper.update: UPDATE prdCategory SET prdCategoryName=#{prdCategoryName} WHERE prdCategoryNum=#{prdCategoryNum}
mapper.select: SELECT p.prdNum, prdName, prdIntro, prdContent, prdPrice, prdDisCount, prdShip, prdPoint, prdHitCount, prdPet, prdState, prdCreated, imgFilename FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN prdImage i ON p.prdNum = i.prdNum WHERE p.prdNum=#{prdNum}
